snippet.title: Zombieville USA 3D - Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Demo
snippet.description:
Zombieville USA 3D is a stylized arcade shooter combining retro gameplay with strikingly polished visuals. Fight through an endless undead horde in the bleak hellscape of suburbia! Choose your weapons, grab a friend, and see how long you can survive.

Developed by Mika Mobile, Inc.
Release Date: March 7th, 2025

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #theforeseenarcade #steamnextfest #steamnextfestfebruary2025 #zombieville #zombievilleusa3d
